```{r , echo=F, include=F, warning=F, message=F, error=F}
library(ggplot2)
library(pander)
library(kableExtra)
library(CodebookGenerator)
library(DT)
```

```{r , echo=F, include=F, warning=F, message=F, error=F}
codebookDF <- gss
```

******************************************************************************************
## Data Frame Summary
```{r , echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
kable(CodebookGenerator::summarizeDataFrame(codebookDF), digits=1) %>%
kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover","condensed"),full_width = F)
```

******************************************************************************************
## Variable Summary
```{r , echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
datatable(CodebookGenerator::summarizeVariables(codebookDF), escape=F, rownames=F, fillContainer=F, style="bootstrap")
```

</div>
<div class = "col-lg-3">



</div>
<div class = "col-lg-4">



</div>
<div class = "col-lg-4">


### <a name="id"></a>id

<div class = "row">
<div class = "col-lg-1 Identifier">
<div class="classholder" >Identifier</div>

</div>
<div class = "col-lg-3">
```{r , echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tab <- variableOverview(codebookDF[["id"]])
 kable(tab, digits=1) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover","condensed")) 
```


</div>
<div class = "col-lg-4">
```{r , echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
tab <- summarizeVariable(codebookDF[["id"]], "Identifier")
 kable(tab, digits=1) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover","condensed"))
```


</div>
<div class = "col-lg-4">
```{r , echo=FALSE, fig.width=4, fig.height=3, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
var <- codebookDF[['id']]
bw=(max(var, na.rm=T)-min(var, na.rm=T))/30
m <- mean(var, na.rm=T)
sd <- sd(var, na.rm=T)
n <- length(!is.na(var))

                   
                  class(codebookDF[['id']]) <- NULL
                  ggplot(data=codebookDF)+
                   geom_histogram(aes(id),color='black',bins=30)+
                   theme_minimal()+
                         stat_function(fun = function(x, mean, sd, n, bw){
                   dnorm(x = x, mean = mean, sd = sd) * bw * n},
                   args = c(mean = m, sd = sd, n = n, bw = bw), color='red')
                   
```


</div>
</div>
